ygData.subject: RE: Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: That is a sad day indeed.  I shall conduct a ritual mourning here among our resident EQ ers, now half the damn dev team, yikes!  His exactness is sorely
ygData.messageBody:
That is a sad day indeed. I shall conduct a ritual mourning here among our
resident EQ'ers, now half the damn dev team, yikes! His exactness is sorely
missed.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 3:31 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith


From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
>Date: Wed, 1 Dec 1999 15:19:40 -0700
>
>Oh Sylly, sometimes you just make me want to start all over on Innoruuk.
>Sounds like you and I are more alike than not alike. Usually I can read
>bard posts all day at work in between compiles and it doesn't bother me,
>but
>you Harm and Kae can really get me in the mood to play EQ, although Kae for
>totally different reasons. Speaking of which, has anyone heard from
>John(tm) lately? Must be on vacation.
>
> Kitasi

John's computer died. It may be a few weeks before he gets it working
again, due to work and the holidays.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
